name: Keep It Up (Lexingto)
description:
A Game Made In 3 Hours...

Your goal is to get the ball to the net without touching the ground

WASD To Move Around

SPACE To Jump

(I was wanting to put a lot more stuff into this game like bouncy pads for the player to roll the ball onto and shoot into the net, enemy's the player had to dodge, a dash, areas for the player to jump over, more levels, more polish and just a lot more in the appearance part too but I simply did not have time. Let me know what you think of this, remember, the game was made in 3 hours XD)
